attributes.title: Worst app on the app store

attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review:
I hope this gets taken off the App Store. This app is horrendous and is incredibly biased towards republicans. I also do not support the production of fake news, which this app gives to users. And to add, this app has many bugs.
